The PhD defense will consist of a ceremony, a short reception, and a celebratory event afterwards. 

This page contains information about the defense itself.  

## Defense Ceremony

- **Date:** 7 June, 2023
- **Time:** 11:00-12:30 CEST
- **Place:** Aula of the University of Amsterdam, Singel 411, 1012 WN Amsterdam (Old Lutheran Church)
